raffle.description: Select one of your viewers randomly

chat.title: Chat
chat.description: Randomly pick someone amongst users that sent a chat command
chat.triggers: Allow viewers to enter raffle by subscribing, following, raiding and more from {LINK} thanks to the {ACTION} trigger action

subs.title: Subs
subs.description: Randomly pick someone amongst all your current subscribers

list.title: List
list.description: Set a custom list of entries and randomly pick one
list.instructions: (Seperate entries with a coma or a line break)

values.title: Values
values.description:
Create a raffle from a {VALUE}.
The Value's content must be either a per-user value or contain entries separated by a custom character.

legal.title: Legal concerns
contents: Depending on your country's legislation, picking a winner amongst your subs or giving them more chances to win might be illegal.
You may want to check this out before doing a giveaway.

configs.timer_overlay_add: {LINK} on your OBS scenes to display the remaining time on your stream

delete_confirm.title: Close raffle
delete_confirm.description: All raffle entries will be lost

params.reward_join: Join with a channel points reward
params.ponderate: Weight entries (additional points given for every matching criteria)
params.ponderate_include_gifter: Include sub gifters (user not sub but that subgifted someone else)
params.ponderate_exclude_gifted: Excluded sub gifted users (user that only got subgifted)

raffle.state_overlay_not_found: Raffle overlay does not exist on current OBS scene
